GSD.product_version: versions from v5.17 to before v5.19.4
GSD.description:
iavf: Fix NULL pointer dereference in iavf_get_link_ksettings

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.4 by commit b305c7e9363f5a174ee08ac5f056e4b209f0325b, it was introduced in version v5.17 by commit 209f2f9c718138ddbd8586e5a1463bd079a17241. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: iavf: Fix NULL pointer dereference in iavf_get_link_ksettings
